QuestData.Title: Zero Xuks Given
QuestData.Description: The spirits have spoken to me. They believe the magnaron, Gro the Uncreator, will join our fight and lead his underlings against the Iron Horde.$b$bThis is an honor beyond any bestowed upon a Laughing Skull, at least in my time.$b$bI will commune with the magnaron, and together we shall destroy the Iron Horde.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Bony Xuk to observe him communing with Gro the Uncreator.
QuestData.RewardText: The spirits of my ancestors have betrayed me! Their skulls are surely laughing.
